channel.title: RUNE X OFFICIAL RELEASE |+ CONTENT PACKED + | BOSSES | PvM & PvP
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i.imgur.com/DiD5BwY.png[/img] [b][url=http://uppit.com/rto6i9xsutlx/Source.zip]Source[/url][/b] [b][url=http://uppit.com/txigojiz1lpf/Client.rar]Client [/url][/b](auto downloads cache) [table] [tr] [td]Innovative Development[/td] [td]Maintained Economy[/td] [td]Beaming Community[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]Our main goal is to develop quality content that pushes RSPS dev boundaries.[/td] [td]We understand the importance of a good economy and the major part it plays in user experience. We will avoid this by:[/td] [td]The community is at the heart of any RSPS. We strive to create a thriving community by:[/td] [/tr] [tr] [td]
[ul][*]Wealth of Development Experience [list] [*]Combined total of 10+ years [*]Professional Industry Experience [/list]
[*]Unique & Complete Content [*]Consistent Updates [*]Quality Assured[/ul]
[/td] [td]
[ul][*]Maintained - We use real data collected from the economy to incrementally improve. [*]Money Sinks - Check out my money sink thread to get an idea of how we will be reducing inflation in the economy.[/ul]
[/td] [td]
[ul][*]Dedicated Staff [*]Professional Conduct [*]Events/Competitions[/ul]
[/td] [/tr] [/table]
[HR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/I2vcakP.png[/img]

[*][COLOR=#00FF00]Abyssal whip[/COLOR] [list] [*][COLOR=#ff0000]​Abyssal Vine Whips[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]​Frozen Whip[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]​Volcanic Vine Whips[/COLOR] [/list]
[*][COLOR=#00FF00]Dragon longsword[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Dragon mace[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Dragon halberd[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Dragon claws[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Granite maul[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Dragon spear[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Armadyl godsword[/COLOR] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]Bandos godsword[/COLOR] [list] [*][COLOR=#00FF00]​Drain your opponents Defence by damage dealt.[/COLOR] [/list]
